page.title: 10WITNESHAM POST OFFICE
page.content: POST MISTRESS ANN JUDD HAS BEEN POST MISTRESS FOR 40 YEARS.FAMILY HAS ALWAYS WORKED THERE.THE POST OFFICE WAS ORIGINALLY NEAR CHURCH LANE AND HAS BEEN AT THE PRESENT SITE FOR 23 YEARS . THE HOUSE WAS BUILT IN 1906. IT IS USED BY MAINLY WITNESHAM AND SWILLAND PEOPLE.IT CARRIES OUT MOST OF THE NORMAL P.O BUSINESS APART FROM VEHICLE LICENSING. 1980'S-THE P.O GIRO BANK IS GROWING IN POPULARITY AND IS NOW ON A PAR WITH BARCLAYS AND LLOYDS.PEOPLE ARE TRYING TO SUPPORT THEIR LOCAL P.O TO PREVENT CLOSURES AND AS A RESULT BUSINESS IS GOOD AND IMPROVING.
